name: Neon Escape (FrolleProductions)
description:
With every action bringing you closer to death, how would you get to the finish line? The only way to replenish health is to kill other players or health-orbs resulting in both a fast-paced and a tactical shooter.  

The game is currently in early access,  however, the movement is pretty advanced and fun. You have 10 levels to choose from with time limits,  4 weapons and 7 perks. Local multiplayer with one map and a finished class system. 

 I hope to be able to create more perks and weapons,  a fully functional multiplayer with official servers with matchmaking.  A steam release and a map editor.  A more complete tutorial with a singleplayer campaign. 

Critique and suggestions are welcome and if you find any bugs please let me know!
